nodes.text: The BramDorc Corporation was a starship manufacturer based in the Unknown Regions that specialized in massive vessels. BramDorc disappeared from the galactic record around 5 BBY, and by 44 ABY only three BramDorc products were known to exist; the Colossus I Beta Series asteroid tug Rockhound, a waterhunter known as the Icebreaker and the Tibanna tanker Gasbag.
